name: Cursed Jouster
description:
In a wondrous basement full of junk, long forsaken by its owners… a techno-sorcery took place. A man’s junk, a villain’s experiment. And so, a freakish being was born. It quickly understood that his, was not a true, heartfelt existence! And it was gonna do something about it.

Cursed Jouster is a 3D platformer developed by three Italian students as their first ever indie project.

Team:

  • Game Developers: Antonio Rocco(https://antonio-rocco.itch.io/), vit c:
  • Game Designer: vit c:
  • 3D Artist(ArtStation): alessandrocornacchia8492

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Left Mouse Button: Attack (final level only)

"Power Shield Fence - Modular pack" (https://skfb.ly/6SEU7) by MRowa is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
